column5: If you are looking for a fishing adventure, consider this camp. We caught plenty of fish and had a great time. Jared and crew went above and beyond to make sure we had a good experience.

Visited with Jared many years ago at a sport show. He was very pleasant, answered all questions and seemed to run a clean modern camp. I would not hesitate to book a trip with him. Plus, he isn't shy about offering his idea's and opinions here.
Good camp, good owner, good location, good fishing, good time! Bill
been going there twice a year for over 10 years. Very nice camp and an excellent group of employees

Thanks everyone for the kind words. We do what we can, and try to have some fun while we're doing it! Fishing has been solid... not unbelievable, but pretty consistent (except for muskies). Hope everyone out there is having a great summer!
